        public Bet​(java.lang.Double inValue,
           Machine machine,
           Card card)
        Creates a new bet. Throws exception if the card is not connected to the machine.
        Parameters:
        inValue - The amount of money bet
        machine - The machine on which the bet is placed
        card - Card used to place a bet
